title: Back!
author: verias
text:
Sorry for the delay guys. Been a lot going on. I've been down with the flu, and J has started a new job working for Hero Lab. So, gratz to J!

We'll be resuming our regular update schedule. Hope you guys enjoy!

Keith W.

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text:
Ooops!  So sorry, flipped a tiny switch and the whole place shorted out. Darn patches...

Glad you're back and getting better, I hope!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Congrats on the new job J!
